name: Software Engineer
a_day_in_life: Start with daily standup and work on coding tasks
reality: Software engineering involves design, testing, and maintenance
growth_path: Junior Developer → Senior Developer → Tech Lead → CTO

name: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes data to extract insights and build ML models
a_day_in_life: Analyze datasets and build predictive models
future_outlook_reason: AI and ML growth across industries
myth: Data science is just Excel and charts
reality: Data science involves complex algorithms and statistical modeling
cons: Requires strong math background,Data quality issues
growth_path: Junior Data Scientist → Senior Data Scientist → Data Science Manager → Chief Data Officer

name: Product Manager
a_day_in_life: Plan sprints and coordinate with cross-functional teams
checklist: Understand user needs,Learn business metrics,Complete product projects
myth: Product management is just managing features
reality: Product management involves strategy, user research, and business metrics
growth_path: Associate PM → Product Manager → Senior PM → VP Product

name: UI/UX Designer
future_outlook_reason: User experience focus in digital products
checklist: Learn design principles,Master design tools,Build portfolio
myth: Design is just making things look pretty
reality: Design involves user research, psychology, and business strategy
growth_path: Junior Designer → Senior Designer → Design Lead → Design Director

name: DevOps Engineer
a_day_in_life: Monitor systems and automate deployment processes
checklist: Learn cloud platforms,Master automation tools,Get certified
reality: DevOps involves culture, automation, and continuous improvement
growth_path: Junior DevOps → Senior DevOps → DevOps Lead → Infrastructure Director
